headline: Thermo Fisher Scientific Showcases the Thermo Fisher Connect Platform at Lab of the Future Europe
summary: WALTHAM, Mass., September 30, 2025--Thermo Fisher Scientific, the world leader in serving science, is sponsoring Lab of the Future Europe this week in Amsterdam, The Netherlands, and will demonstrate how the company’s Thermo Fisher™ Connect Platform can integrate and future-proof laboratories.

headline: OutSystems Announces General Availability of Agent Workbench, Empowering Enterprises to Drive Business Impact with Agentic Systems
summary: LISBON, Portugal, September 30, 2025--OutSystems, the leading AI-powered low-code development platform, today announced the general availability of OutSystems Agent Workbench. Agent Workbench empowers enterprises to unlock the business value of AI and agentic systems, making it simple to create and orchestrate intelligent AI agents across use cases, departments, data sets and workflows.
